```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(lubridate)
library(kableExtra)
library(janitor)
```


### janitor::get_dupes()

```{r}
starwars_dupes <- get_dupes(starwars)

starwars_dupes_names <- starwars %>% 
  get_dupes(name)

starwars_dupes_hair_eye_color <- starwars %>% 
  get_dupes(hair_color, eye_color)
starwars_dupes_hair_eye_color
```


### dplyr::across()

```{r}
sw_across <- starwars %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.character), tolower))
```

```{r}
starwars %>% 
  group_by(homeworld) %>% 
  summarize(across(where(is.numeric), mean, na.rm = TRUE))
```

### basic / common troubleshooting stuff

```{r}
starwars %>% 
  filter(homeworld == "Naboo")
```

```{r}
starwars %>% 
  separate(skin_color, into = c("col_1", "col_2"), sep = ",")

```


```{r}
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
troubleshooting <- penguins %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), as.character)) %>% 
  mutate(island = fct_relevel(island, c("Dream", "Biscoe", "Torgersen"))) %>% 
  unite(island_yr, c(island, year), sep = "_") %>% 
  filter(species %in% c("Adelie", "Chinstrap")) %>% 
  relocate(island_yr, .after = species) %>% 
  rename(penguin_spp = species)
```

Making a reprex
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- tribble(
  ~name, ~height, ~hair_color,
  "Teddy", 2.2, "brown",
  "Khora", 3.1, "white",
  "Waffle", 1.0, "tan"
)

df %>% 
  filter(name == "Waffle")

```
